sense.gloss: stand-in, proxy, alternate, deputy, relief, successor
another helping, second helping, seconds, refill
x: お代わり・おかわり・1

sense.gloss: alternation, change, relief, relay, shift, substitution (sports, etc.), taking turns
taking over (e.g. store or family's headship)
subrogation, substitution of one person for another (usu. a creditor)
change, alteration, substitute, spare, replacement, proxy
to succeed, to relieve, to replace
to take the place of, to substitute for, to take over for, to represent, to hand over (telephone)
to be exchanged, to change (places with), to switch
money transfer (usu. between accounts held by the same person)
to change, to exchange, to convert, to renew, to throw a switch, to replace, to switch over
dubbing (of a film, etc. into a different language)
seasonal change of clothing, changing one's dress for the season
renovation, facelift, redesign, redecoration, new appearance, fresh look
parody (of a song), new lyrics to an old melody, song parody
to replace, to substitute, to shift, to change places
to change places (with), to be replaced (with, by), to be changed
to change (seats, shifts, etc.; with someone), to switch, to exchange
to change completely, to switch (to), to shift (to another mode)
to exchange, to swap, to barter
advancing (someone) money, payment on someone's behalf (with the expectation of being reimbursed later)
switch (to another ideology, party, system, method, etc.), change, conversion
transfer (of ownership), putting (something) in another's name
to replace, to move, to change the position of
buying a replacement, replacing by buying something new
to say in other words, to put another way, to express in different words, to reword, to rephrase
to change (to another ideology, party, company, etc.), to switch (to a different system, method, etc.), to move on to (e.g. a new love interest)
turning point, change, transition, turn (of the tide, century, etc.)
to buy a replacement, to replace by buying something new
to rewrite, to overwrite, to renew, to transfer
taking over another's debt, shouldering someone else's burden, subrogation
substitution (for someone else), substitute, stand-in, scapegoat, sacrifice
changing (one's job, loyalties, stance, etc.), switching over
changing quarters (of a geisha, prostitute, etc.)

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓のラジオを↑僕↑↓ぼく↓の↑自転車↑↓じてんしゃ↓と↑取↑↓と↓り↑替↑↓か↓えっこしないか。
sdata.e: Will you give me your radio for my bicycle?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓に↑替↑↓か↓わる↑人↑↓ひと↓はどこにもいない。
sdata.e: I look around but it's you I can't replace.

sdata.j: ↑近所↑↓きんじょ↓の↑人々↑↓ひとびと↓が↑彼↑↓かれ↓とともに、↑交替↑↓こうたい↓で↑夜↑↓よる↓を↑明↑↓あ↓かした。
sdata.e: The neighbors took turns sitting up with him.

sdata.j: ↑橋↑↓はし↓は↑塗↑↓ぬ↓り↑替↑↓か↓え↑中↑↓なか↓である。
sdata.e: The bridge is being repainted.

sdata.j: ↑外貨↑↓がいか↓の↑為替↑↓かわせ↓レートは↑毎日↑↓まいにち↓↑変↑↓か↓わる。
sdata.e: The exchange rates for foreign currency change daily.

sdata.j: ↑海↑↓うみ↓に↑面↑↓めん↓した↑部屋↑↓へや↓に↑替↑↓か↓えて↑下↑↓くだ↓さい。
sdata.e: I'd like a room facing the ocean instead.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は↑交替↑↓こうたい↓で↑車↑↓くるま↓を↑運転↑↓うんてん↓した。
sdata.e: We took turns driving the car.

sdata.j: ↑家族↑↓かぞく↓のものは↑交替↑↓こうたい↓で↑病人↑↓びょうにん↓の↑看護↑↓かんご↓をした。
sdata.e: The members of the family nursed the patient by turns.

sdata.j: ↑円↑↓えん↓をドルに↑両替↑↓りょうがえ↓できますか。
sdata.e: Can I exchange yen for dollars here?

sdata.j: ↑円↑↓えん↓をドルに↑替↑↓か↓えてくれる↑銀行↑↓ぎんこう↓がありますか。
sdata.e: Is there a bank where I can exchange yen for dollars?

sdata.j: ↑円↑↓えん↓の↑為替↑↓かわせ↓レートを↑知↑↓し↓りたいんですけど。
sdata.e: I'd like to know the exact exchange rate for yen.

sdata.j: ↑着替↑↓きが↓えてください。
sdata.e: Please get dressed.

sdata.j: ↑為替↑↓かわせ↓↑相場↑↓そうば↓は↑毎日↑↓まいにち↓↑会計↑↓かいけい↓↑室↑↓しつ↓の↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑掲示↑↓けいじ↓される。
sdata.e: The exchange rates are posted daily outside the cashier's office.

sdata.j: ↑為替↑↓かわせ↓↑相場↑↓そうば↓は↑１↑↓いち↓ドル↑１４５↑↓ひゃくよんじゅうご↓↑円↑↓えん↓だ。
sdata.e: The rate of exchange is 145 yen to the dollar.

sdata.j: ワープロが↑万↑↓まん↓↑一↑↓いち↓↑故障↑↓こしょう↓したら、↑無料↑↓むりょう↓でお↑取↑↓と↓り↑替↑↓か↓えすることを↑保証↑↓ほしょう↓します。
sdata.e: Should the word processor go wrong, we guarantee to replace it free of charge.

sdata.j: もっと↑大↑↓おお↓きいのと↑取↑↓と↓り↑替↑↓か↓えてください。
sdata.e: If it's possible, I'd like to exchange this for a larger size.

sdata.j: もし、システムの↑完全↑↓かんぜん↓な↑入↑↓い↓れ↑替↑↓か↓えが↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓ということになれば、↑彼↑↓かれ↓らは↑古↑↓ふる↓いシステムで↑満足↑↓まんぞく↓することと↑思↑↓おも↓う。
sdata.e: If it's going to require a total restructuring, I'm sure they will be satisfied with the old system.

sdata.j: メアリーと↑妹↑↓いもうと↓は↑交替↑↓こうたい↓で↑母親↑↓ははおや↓の↑看病↑↓かんびょう↓をした。
sdata.e: Mary and her sister took turns at looking after their sick mother.

sdata.j: ペソを↑両替↑↓りょうがえ↓して↑欲↑↓ほ↓しいんですけど。
sdata.e: I'd like to change these pesos, please.

sdata.j: プリンターの↑空↑↓から↓のインクを↑取↑↓と↓り↑替↑↓か↓えて↑下↑↓くだ↓さい。
sdata.e: Please replace the empty ink jet cartridge in the printer.

sdata.j: ビザを↑観光↑↓かんこう↓から↑商用↑↓しょうよう↓に↑替↑↓か↓えられますか。
sdata.e: Can I switch over from a sightseeing visa to a business one?

sdata.j: トラベラーズチェックを↑現金↑↓げんきん↓に↑替↑↓か↓えてくれるのはこの↑窓口↑↓まどぐち↓ですか。
sdata.e: Is this the right window for cashing travelers' checks?

sdata.j: このトラベラーズチェックを↑両替↑↓りょうがえ↓してください。
sdata.e: I'd like to cash a travelers' check.

sdata.j: どのように↑両替↑↓りょうがえ↓いたしましょうか。
sdata.e: How do you want them?

sdata.j: どこで↑乗↑↓の↓り↑替↑↓が↓えたらよいか↑教↑↓おし↓えてくれませんか。
sdata.e: Will you tell me where to change trains?

sdata.j: どこで↑円↑↓えん↓をドルに↑両替↑↓りょうがえ↓できますか。
sdata.e: Where can I exchange yen for dollars?

sdata.j: どこでドルをポンドに↑両替↑↓りょうがえ↓できますか。
sdata.e: Where can dollars be exchanged for pounds?

sdata.j: どこか↑行↑↓い↓く↑前↑↓まえ↓に、いくらかお↑金↑↓かね↓を↑両替↑↓りょうがえ↓しないとね。
sdata.e: Before we go anywhere, we should exchange some money.

sdata.j: ですから↑私↑↓わたし↓たちは、↑社員↑↓しゃいん↓が↑現金↑↓げんきん↓ではなく、エレクトロニクスによる↑振替↑↓ふりかえ↓でお↑金↑↓かね↓を↑受↑↓う↓け↑取↑↓と↓るよう、↑説得↑↓せっとく↓に↑努↑↓つと↓めているのです。
sdata.e: Therefore, we try to persuade people not to have cash, to have money electronically transferred.

sdata.j: チャンネルを↑替↑↓か↓えてもかまわない？
sdata.e: Do you mind if I change the channel?
